posts.description:
Eleuthera has the most amazing sunsets! I love this island so much. It feels like home each time I'm here. If you want to see more, watch my stories. I can't wait for tomorrow - My guests will arrive for my 4th annual Bahamas yoga retreat. So excited to meet everyone! #magichour
_

Day 17 #effectivehandstands 
@omstarsofficial @kinoyoga - tomorrow is Tuck Handstand! We are coming close to the end of our challenge! Are you still with us? Are you following our handstand course on omstars.com? Leave me a comment and let me know! 
_

Click the link in my bio to subscribe. First month is $5 - use "wearelive". #handstand #eleuthera

Yesterday while on a date with my husband, I got hit with one of the worst migraines of my life. Since we weren't home, I couldn't do my little migraine hacks during the first 15 min of the visual aura (if you are familiar with migraines there is a window of 15 min where you see flashing lights and go partially blind before you get the migraine) so it was the first time in awhile I've actually had a full blown migraine. 
_

Not to be dramatic, but I thought my brain was swelling to the point I might actually die. For 5 hours I laid in a dark room and tried my best to sleep it off but who can sleep with that much pain? I couldn't post for #effectivehandstands which I have never missed posting for one of my challenges before but really, I didn't think anyone would care. 
_

Today, I'm in the "migraine hangover" stage as I call it where I have a bad headache, eyes are swollen, and I feel like I got hit by a truck. I have to figure out a way to stop these migraines because I can't live this way. 
_

So, before you give me all your suggestions just know that I've tried them ALL. I'm the kind of person that will try anything anyone tells me if it means I don't have to endure this pain anymore. Really though, right now I'm feeling so down and depressed about it because nothing has worked. 
_
If you get migraines or know anything that maybe has worked for others feel free to leave me a comment. 🙏🏻 Thank you for your continued love and support. I love you guys!

#migraine
Happy Earth day! We live on a gorgeous planet! 🌎 This image is from Eleuthera - my favorite place in the world. Can't wait to go back this Tuesday!🤸‍♀️🙏🏻🙌🏻 #eleuthera #Bahamas #paradise

I really wish I had more before photos but, on the left was an image from my very first challenge that I hosted 4 1/2 years ago. I think it was my first attempt at pushing up into wheel pose as well. I had 500 followers and I didn't care about not being able to actually do any of the poses on the challenge. I just wanted to inspire myself to try to change and guess what ... it worked! Photo on the right is a screen grab from my challenge post last night. Read my story on my last post if you need inspiration. 💪🏻
_
@yogaprowheel is on sale for 25% off. Use "spring" at checkout. 
Yogaprowheel.com 👈🏻
#flashbackfriday #transformation #yoga

Hard day today not gonna lie... I could make up a positive, feel good post but I figure you guys would appreciate the honesty more. I went to the beach today and that was nice but there definitely was a heaviness lingering all day. One thing I've learned in my life is that whenever I feel this way it's because something isn't "going my way". So, I have to let go and accept that, at least for today, this is how it is. My attitude is everything. I could sit here and cry, complain, and blame everyone else but the reality is, how I respond to life is how "good" my life will be. Pain sucks. All pain... physical, emotional, & spiritual. It all sucks and it's all equal. Someone once said to me "pain is pain" and in that moment I realized to each person their pain is as real as anyone else's regardless of the cause. It all hurts. We can sit here and judge each other's struggles or we can accept that everyone is fighting some kind of battle and choose to be kind. 🙏🏻
_
#effectivehandstands day 10 One knee tuck handstand! This pose will actually make you feel better! Try it! Full class online at Omstars.com. Use "wearelive" and your first month is $5! Link in bio!🔗🤸‍♀️
@kinoyoga @omstarsofficial

Why am I smiling?😁Because I just finished filming 12 new classes for @omstarsofficial and I'm so excited about it! At the end of this month, I will be announcing a Beginner Yoga Challenge... 10 min a day for 10 days learning one pose a day! This course is for the total beginner who has no time, no clue, no motivation, but can commit to just 10 minutes a day for 10 days! I'll be posting about it sometime next week so be on the lookout! _
_
Follow @omstarsofficial to stay up to date with all our new content we are releasing and please keep sending me your experiences via email or direct message! It really does motivate me when I'm feeling down or tired to keep doing what I am doing. You have no idea how much it lifts my spirits to know that what we are doing with #Omstars is helping others.🙏🏻
_
#livetheyogilife #beginneryoga #yoga

What does meditation mean to you? Do you do it? Not good at it? Love it? Does it help you? I'm curious to know what others think about it. I've been meditating for 15 years although I'd call it "listening". Just listen. There is so much to be heard if you are able to just slow down, let go, and listen. 
_ 
Day 7 #effectivehandstands is rest day. Please do our meditation tomorrow and tell me how you felt afterwards! 
@kinoyoga @omstarsofficial 
www.omstars.com

What a beautiful day it is on this Good Friday! Whether or not you follow the teachings of Jesus, his message was clear. Love one another. Just love people where they are at -no matter what religion, gender, or race they are ... just love people. If the only thing you do right in this world is love others than you have exceeded beyond all measure. Remember that next time you compare yourself to others or someone tells you that you aren't good enough at what you do. Being able to love others (especially the ones that are hard to love) is the highest gift and what ultimately can change our world. #goodfriday #loveothers ♥️

Get on your mat and move today. Don't hesitate, just do it. Practice begins in the mind ... the body will follow. 
_
Come practice with me!
MIAMI
ORLANDO
NYC

PORTLAND, OR
